nodes.text: This was a lightsaber that was inspired by the Kashyyyk system.

The Kashyyyk Lightsaber is a Lightsaber that was gifted to all lifetime members of Clone Wars Adventures during the update for June 24th, 2011, and is also given for free with the purchase of the Summer Passÿ. It is the first lightsaber in Clone Wars Adventures to not be included in an outfit set and is also the most expensive individual item of gear. When purchased, players will also receive a green crystal and another unidentified crystal that makes large points emerge from the lightsaber.
